generateLargeRandom

public static BigInteger generateLargeRandom(int lowerBound,
                                             int upperBound,
                                             Random r)
Creates a large random number (BigInteger) up to bits bits. This differs from the BigInteger constructor, in that it generates all numbers from the range 2^lower to 2^n, rather than 2^n-1 to 2^n.
